Walnut_Creek.Orion Academy (California):
Orion Academy is a private high school in Moraga, California, United States, for students challenged by Asperger's syndrome, nonverbal learning disorder (NLD), and other neurocognitive disabilities. It offers a special education college preparatory program for grades 9-12.
The school maintains a staff-to-student ratio of 1:4 with an average class size of eight.
